verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines: I was bored on the list field, I got smashed at the war And the booze has been flowing all night; Though some say my wits will grow rusted and dull, I will drink like a mad dog tonight.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The king's men were pissed off, They all drew their swords, Ready to beat up this rude knight, But the king wouldn't let them, 'cause he was drunk too And these words he said unto his men:

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: You were bored on the list field, You got smashed at the war And the booze will be flowing all night; Though some say your wits will grow rusted and dull, You must party like mad dogs tonight.

verse.name: v3
c3
verse.lines: We were bored on the list field, We got smashed at the war And the booze has been flowing all night; Though some say our wits will grow rusted and dull, We will drink all the Mad Dog tonight.

verse.name: v4
c4
verse.lines: We were bored on the list field, We got smashed at the war And the booze (it) kept flowing all night; Though it's true our wits have grown rusted and dull, We partied like good knights last night.
